entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.7°C
Wind: WNW 40 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
